content:
Arkkane vellum bhaasulllla vismayathaaram thaathante
Vachanatthin maanavajanmam-vidvaanmaareyariyichu.
Doothan chonnoraashcharyam-bethalahemil kaanaanaayu
Kaazhchakallenti siddhanmaar-yaathraykkaayuthsaahichu.
Vaanavasenakallaa guhayil keriyirangunnathu kandaar
Daaveedin makall mariyaamin-thaaraattin paattum kettu.
Sheelatthundukallaal chutti-kaalikkoottil mevunna
Paithalineyum darshichaa-raarppu villichaanandikkaam.
Sthothram daivatthinu vaanil-bhoomiyilaikyakshemangall
Nal prathyaasha nararkkennum-sthothram nithyam sarvveshaa!!
